channel.title: 🏢 Nanyang Business School, Nanyang Technological University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Nanyang Business School, Nanyang Technological University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Noisy Dual Mirror Descent: A Near Optimal Algorithm for Jointly-DP Convex Resource Allocation
item.description: Near-optimal algorithm for private resource allocation is introduced, achieving improved accuracy and privacy guarantees.
